metadata.title: CVE-2022-29078 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The ejs (aka Embedded JavaScript templates) package 3.1.6 for Node.js allows server-side template injection in settings[view options][outputFunctionName]. This is parsed as an internal option, and overwrites the outputFunctionName option with an arbitrary OS command (which is executed upon template compilation).

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
